blogPost.title: What have you learned from transitioning to online teaching? Answer by Frank Spors, Western University of Health Sciences. https://t.co/kMK2BzuYiE https://t.co/EeZb78rAI1
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 转型到网络教学后，你有什么收获？西部卫生科学大学Frank Spors回答：https://t.co/kMK2BzuYiE https://t.co/EeZb78rAI1。
轉型到網絡教學後，你有什麼收穫？西部衛生科學大學Frank Spors回答：https://t.co/kMK2BzuYiE https://t.co/EeZb78rAI1。
